title: The Wizard, the Prince and the Good Fairy

sources.title: The Wizard, The Prince And The Good Fairy (1900) Directed By Georges Méliès
sources.description: The Wizard, the Prince and the Good Fairy (1900) 'Le sorcier, le prince et le bon génie' Director: Georges Méliès A prince gets the help of a fairy to aid in his conflict with a wizard.

metadata.Plot: A prince visits a wizard, and asks him to conjure up a fiancee to be his wife. But the wizard plays several tricks on the prince, who is infuriated, when the wizard's magic then turns him into a poor minstrel. This makes the prince sob with grief. Suddenly, the good fairy makes an appearance, gives the prince his fiancee, and cages the wizard, so the prince can then marry.
